name: carol
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a happy or religious song, usually one sung at Christmas: a carol concert "Silent Night" is my favourite (Christmas) carol.

a Christmas carol
to sing carols, esp. by going from house to house: We went caroling in the neighborhood.
